name: Army Truck 3D Simulator 2016
description:
Drive Army Truck and enjoy simulator. Be an offroad driver.
its easy to ride a transport truck , delivery truck , logging truck , and other truck as they are not driven on crazy roads and environment.

Army truck is driven in Dirt, rocks,sand,mud and rivers .

Drive different Army Truck on offload and hillside terrains in this driving simulator game of 2016.

Train your and upgrade your offroad driving skills for critical circumstances.

This game have ability to try different trucks with different powers and stability.

Complete different levels or missions, earn money, and buy new power ups.

Army Truck Offload simulation games Driver features:

- Different trucks with powers for off-road driving
- Amazing views and terranes
- 3D graphics for more fun
- Different camera view and navigation
- Emulation of low gear and diff lock
- Realistic simulator game

Feel extreme with Army Truck Simulator 3D 2016 Offroad Driver! Avoid obstacles, drive fast and have fun!

please leave your review as we can improve our self for next updates.

Download FREE and enjoy!!
